title.rendered: Marvel’s Moon Girl and Devil Dinosaur

content.rendered:
Directed by Ben Juwono. Trey Buongiorno. Samantha Suyi Lee. Christine Liu. Rodney Clouden.

Written by Jeffrey M. Howard. Jeffrey M. Howard. Jeffrey M. Howard. Kate Kondell. Kate Kondell. Kate Kondell. Steve Loter. Halima Lucas. Lisa Muse Bryant. Liz Hara. Taylor Vaughn Lasley. Maggie Rose.

Cast Fred Tatasciore (Devil Dinosaur 1). Alfre Woodard (Mimi 1). Libe Barer (Casey 1). Sasheer Zamata (Adria). Laurence Fishburne (Backstory Man). Gary Anthony Williams (Pops). Jermaine Fowler (James Jr). Michael Cimin/Epo (Eduardo). Omid Abtahi (Ahmed). Kimberly Brooks (Additional Voices). Utkarsh Ambudkar (Anand). Indya Moore (Brooklyn). Craig Robinson (Principal Nelson). Alanna Ubach (Brooklyn and TJ’s mother). Tajinae Turner (Geri). Ian Alexander (Tai). Alison Brie (Aftershock). Josh Keaton (Angelo). Asia Kate Dillon (LOS-307).

Language English.

Producers Rodney Clouden. Pilar Flynn. Kate Kondell. Lisa Muse Bryant. Steve Loter. Laurence Fishburne. Jeffrey M. Howard. Helen Sugland. Ben Juwono. Halima Lucas. Series Casting By. Tatiana Bull.

Production Cinema Gypsy Productions. Disney Television Animation. Marvel Animation.

Creators Jeffrey M. Howard(developed for television by). Kate Kondell(developed for television by). Steve Loter(developed for television by).

No. of Seasons 2

No. of Episodes 15

Status On Going (2023–)
